main event: An unidentified flying object was observed for 45 seconds in Bridgeboro, New Jersey.
interesting points: Object observed was round and compared in size to a nickel held at arm's length,The color of the object was described as black-grey and it scintillated with blurred edges,The observer noticed the object through an office window before going outside to continue observation,The object exhibited erratic movements including high speed and abrupt directional changes,The disappearance of the object was observed in the eastern direction towards the horizon.
sighted object: one round object in the sky
